text: HNl 7rrl4 TGTHTf] x1feasrut 3414 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 (Hs& 9r7 31r <TTHPT 'TATT4) 4RH Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 H1 R1 >T National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 41-5 ga 6, 8+2(-10, ERrTI, T{ frril-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 No.11041/217/2007-Admn Ih December, 2012 PQLCY_MATIERS-ADMNZFIN ( 100/2012) [Decision taken on File No 11041/218/2007-Admnl Sub: Implementation of Executive Committee decisions-reg: t has been noted that the decision of the Executive committee on a particular issue is again processed on file for approval of the Chairman. This is causing unnecessary delay in implementalion of the decision 2. It has, therefore , been decided with the approval of the Competent Authority that decision of the Executive Committee on a particular matter may be implemented by the concerned General Manager and need not be further processed on file. 3. In case the issue is required to be processed on file, the Competent Authority will be Member concerned. 4 This issues with the approval of Chairman: (V.K.Sharma) Chief General Manager (Coord./LA) To_ AlLolticersand_eaployees of_HQLZO[ROs[PIUsICMUs/Site Qitices NHAI
